title: CARFIX AI
description: Car Diagnostics App Powered By AI
body: This user-friendly AI car diagnosis app not only enables users to input symptoms or prompts for issue identification but also offers DIY-friendly guidance, allowing owners to tackle some of the maintenance or repairs themselves, ultimately promoting self-sufficiency and cost savings.

title: WhiskerGram
description: Social media to show off our beloved pets
body: This web application facilitates the sharing of images, enables users to like posts from others, and allows users to connect by adding them as friends.

title: Dream Home Remodels
description: Website created for local fencing company in Tampa, FL
body: Static Web App with 'Get A Quote' button implementation for users to get estimates.

title: Crypto Coin Exchange
description: An application for exchange coins that tracks the prices of various cryptocurrencies.
body: I have a significant interest in the cryptocurrency industry and wanted to develop an application that reflects this enthusiasm. This app connects to the Coin Paprika API, allowing users to view real-time cryptocurrency prices.

title: Sonrisa Al Atardecer
body: I developed this website for a Colombian client who owns a spa. It marked one of my initial paid projects and served as a fantastic introduction to front-end development, particularly HTML and CSS.

title: Taskify
body: One of my early projects involved using React, and it was a fantastic opportunity to delve into the inner workings of React. What better way to explore React than by creating a task planner?
